Setting as answered!

You must not burn when your Periapsis is behind you, else that's what's gonna happen. You can either start burning a bit more towards the ground to push your periapsis further away, or try to get a better TWR on your rocket.
I'll try burning 20 secs before I reach the Apoapsis, what's TWR?

Usually you want to do half your burn before the maneuver node, and the other half after. TWR is your Thrust to Weight Ratio, or in other words, your acceleration. The higher it is, the more preceise your burns and maneuvers will be. It's just a question of fine tuning your maneuver nodes and of making sure you don't get past your periapsis.
